summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3405 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 7, Denny-Fuhrman Addition, being the alley between Harvard Avenue North and Boylston Avenue North, from Roanoke Street to Edgar Street; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 42225, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
